title: rustc: native on znver2 CPU picks znver1 for target-cpu

labels.name: A-LLVM
labels.description: Area: Code generation parts specific to LLVM. Both correctness bugs and optimization-related issues.

labels.name: A-target-feature
labels.description: Area: Enabling/disabling target features like AVX, Neon, etc.

body:
I have a Ryzen 7 PRO 4750U on my laptop which gcc sees as `march=znver2`:

```
$ gcc -march=native -Q --help=target
The following options are target specific:
  -m128bit-long-double                  [enabled]
  -m16                                  [disabled]
  -m32                                  [disabled]
  -m3dnow                               [disabled]
  -m3dnowa                              [disabled]
  -m64                                  [enabled]
  -m80387                               [enabled]
  -m8bit-idiv                           [disabled]
  -m96bit-long-double                   [disabled]
  -mabi=                                sysv
  -mabm                                 [enabled]
  -maccumulate-outgoing-args            [disabled]
  -maddress-mode=                       long
  -madx                                 [enabled]
  -maes                                 [enabled]
  -malign-data=                         compat
  -malign-double                        [disabled]
  -malign-functions=                    0
  -malign-jumps=                        0
  -malign-loops=                        0
  -malign-stringops                     [enabled]
  -mandroid                             [disabled]
  -march=                               znver2
...
```

However, rustc sees this CPU as `march=znver1`:

```
$ rustc --print target-cpus
Available CPUs for this target:
    native         - Select the CPU of the current host (currently znver1).
```

### Meta

`rustc --version --verbose`:
```
rustc 1.53.0 (53cb7b09b 2021-06-17)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 53cb7b09b00cbea8754ffb78e7e3cb521cb8af4b
commit-date: 2021-06-17
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.53.0
LLVM version: 12.0.1
```
